name: cron-bak
description: Comprehensive backup service with scheduled task management

scripts.docker:run: docker run -d --name backup-service -p 3000:3000 -v backup_data:/app/data -v backup_logs:/app/logs -v backup_temp:/app/temp backup-service:latest
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop backup-service && docker rm backup-service
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' > VERSION
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' > VERSION
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' > VERSION

author: Backup Service
